languages.text: {n}Кибелла расплывается в улыбке, жестокой и горькой.{/n} "Ты продолжаешь красть у меня. Даже мою месть ты сделал частью своего ритуала".
{n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла расплывается в улыбке, жестокой и горькой.{/n} "Ты продолжаешь красть у меня. Даже мою месть ты сделал частью своего ритуала".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah's face dissolves in a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "Still you are stealing from me. You have even made my vengeance part of your ritual."
{n}Kibellah's face dissolves in a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "Still you are stealing from me. You have even made my vengeance part of your ritual."
{n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."
{n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."
{n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."
{n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."

languages.text: {n}L'expression de Kibellah se mue en un rictus cruel et amer.{/n} « Et pourtant, vous n'avez de cesse de me déposséder de tout ce qui me revient de droit. Il n'est pas jusqu'à ma vengeance que vous n'ayez usurpée pour votre rituel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression de Kibellah se mue en un rictus cruel et amer.{/n} « Et pourtant, vous n'avez de cesse de me déposséder de tout ce qui me revient de droit. Il n'est pas jusqu'à ma vengeance que vous n'ayez usurpée pour votre rituel. »

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Kibellah pasa a mostrar una sonrisa cruel y amarga.{/n} «Y aun así, sigue robándome cosas. Mi venganza no es más que parte de su ritual».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Kibellah pasa a mostrar una sonrisa cruel y amarga.{/n} «Y aun así, sigue robándome cosas. Mi venganza no es más que parte de su ritual».

languages.text: {n}キベラの顔に厳しく冷たい笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「なおも我から奪うのですか。我が復讐さえもあなたの儀式の一部なのですね」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラの顔に厳しく冷たい笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「なおも我から奪うのですか。我が復讐さえもあなたの儀式の一部なのですね」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈脸上露出了笑容，充满了残忍与苦涩。{/n}“而你依然在夺走属于我的东西，就连我的复仇，也成为了你仪式的一部分。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈脸上露出了笑容，充满了残忍与苦涩。{/n}“而你依然在夺走属于我的东西，就连我的复仇，也成为了你仪式的一部分。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellahs Gesicht löst sich zu einem grausamen, verbitterten Grinsen auf.{/n} "Und doch bestehlt Ihr mich. Selbst meine Rache ist Teil Eures Rituals geworden."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellahs Gesicht löst sich zu einem grausamen, verbitterten Grinsen auf.{/n} "Und doch bestehlt Ihr mich. Selbst meine Rache ist Teil Eures Rituals geworden."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah'nın yüzüne gaddar ve acı bir gülümseme yerleşiyor.{/n} "Yine de benden bir şeyler çalmaya devam ediyorsunuz. İntikamım bile ayininizin bir parçası hâline gelmiş."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah's face dissolves into a cruel and bitter smile.{/n} "And still you steal from me. Even my vengeance has become part of your ritual."
